content:
grouped form example: sertraline 50 mg tablet
extended form example: sertraline 50 mg coated tablet (Lab)

grouped form example: metformin 500 mg modificate release tablet
extended form example: metformin 500 mg prolonged release tablets (Lab)

grouped form example: omeprazole 20 mg tablet
extended form example: omeprazole 20 mg gastro - resistant coated tablets (Lab)

In Chile, we use grouped form for clinic medication and extended form in commercial products
